name: Cyclobaston
description:
Ages ago, knights were used to defy each other in a joust to prove their honour or to conquer their special one's heart. Chivalry, you know. And huge ego.

Those traditions stayed, and for ethical reasons, they don't  ride horses anymore, but bikes. 

Use your best glove and slap your friend in the face to defy him in an epical joust !

Have fun !

The game can be played with two keyboard configuration, depending if you choose Bike or Knight.

  •  MagicaVoxel : background modeling and typo
  • Maya :  character modeling / animation/ lighting/ rendering
  • Mixamo : automatic rigging and victory/defeat animations
  • Adobe Photoshop script : sprite sheet creator
  • Construct 2 : game making software
